snippet: General Manager John Idzik said, “We felt it wasn’t good for the team to go forward” with cornerback Dimitri Patterson, who was released Saturday.
abstract: NFL Roundup; New York Jets release cornerback Dimitri Patterson for what amounts to insubordination.
lead_paragraph: General Manager John Idzik said, “We felt it wasn’t good for the team to go forward” with cornerback Dimitri Patterson, who was released Saturday.

headline.main: Idzik Says Jets Have No Regrets in Cutting Patterson
headline.print_headline: No Regrets in Releasing Cornerback, Jets G.M. Says
